package com.yulin.com;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;

public class FileDemo {
	public static  void main(String[] args){
		String path ="src/demo.txt";
		File file=new File(path);
		try {
			file.createNewFile();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

}
